name: sprightliness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being energetic and in good health, especially when you are old: Due to his sprightliness, everyone thought he was much younger than he actually was. He walked off slowly with none of his usual sprightliness. See
sprightly
More examplesFewer examplesHer inexhaustible sprightliness is still there.I was envious of his sprightliness and of the astonishing range of his activities.This diet could explain the longevity and sprightliness of the islanders.
